## IDownloadProgressCb type

Callback that periodically informs about download progress.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type IDownloadProgressCb = (received: number, total: number) => void;
```

## Remarks

<b>received</b>: Number in range \[0,total\]<br> <b>total</b>: Number in range \[0,INFINITY) that stays the same across invocations of the function.
